TextView.android:text: After an undeserenable amout of time, you gain control of your body. Your look around you, struggling to remember what happened. You have a look at the once brightly-lit cabin nad then compare how it now stands. Dark as night, aside from small little flames from the circuitry. It's probaly a good thing you can bearly see past your nose. As decide to stand up, fumbling as you walk. You step off of the cold metal unto the forest underbrush, you gaze upon your surroundings only to be met back by natures' petrrfying stare.
